name: Slick Ass Bear goes for a BEER
name_original: Slick Ass Bear goes for a BEER
description:
A first person game where you as a Bear slide through the  snowy alps to get a beer. Windows desktop and Windows Oculus Rift VR supported.

Controls Keyboard

WASD / ARROWS  - steer, accelerate, break, rotate in-air
SPACE - reset game

Controller

left stick - steer, rotate in air
left trigger - break
right trigger - Accelerate
A - reset game


Oculus rift

right stick - steer, accelerate, break, rotate in-air
A reset game
